title.rendered: AERON AW24 during Copenhagen Fashion Week

content.rendered:
AERON Fall-Winter 2024 COLLECTION at Copenhagen Fashion Week

Hailing from Budapest-a symbol of Neo-Classical beauty-Aeron is the epitome of sophisticated presence and effortless elegance: the modern woman's complexity in balance. Our garments are seamlessly blending the timelessness of traditional tailoring with progressive artisanal techniques, designed to accompany women from day to night. Born in our in-house atelier in a collaborative spirit, each collection aims for uncompromising quality driven by the latest waste-reducing innovations and responsible sourcing practices. Our dedication to build elevated wardrobe essentials transcends our belief in empowering women

Runway Looks

Photo: Press AERON 

More on: @aeronstudio


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
